name: Chaos
overview: A cross-hairs shooter where you have to shoot the number of aliens shown at the left before you run out of Sinus shown on the right. The number of opponents coming will always start with 40. The squadrons are made up of only a few elements and will bound and swoop as they approach. Good luck defenders! Published in Italy by all the major publishers of the time under various names; View-finder in Videoteca Computer n.39, as Trainer in Special C64 n.1 (1991/1992), and as Mirabix in Special Program n.91 (ottobre 1992).
